# The `raw_sha1_ostream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> that hash the content using the sha1 algorithm. <a href="#details">More...</a>
